document.full_text: italian prime minister silvio berlusconi has said he may not stand for re-election in 2013 but could play a behind-the-scenes role as a kind of father figure to the center right.
document.title: italy's berlusconi says may not seek re-election
lines_and_colors: italian prime minister silvio berlusconi has said he may not stand for re-election in 2013 but could play a behind-the-scenes role as a kind of father figure to the center right.
